channel.title: Turning wilderness into a safezone [317 servers]!
channel.description:
Description: Turn an area where pvp is allowed into a safe zone!
Approximate time it will take to finish: 10 minutes with experience and 20 max if you have no idea what you are doing.
Difficulty(1 to 10, 1 being the easiest): 1 (3 if you have no experience)
Steps:
1. Open Client.java
2. Search for
Code: public boolean nonwildUnder this you should see something that looks like this (This one is just for show, it is just a random spot so i can show you)
Code: || (absX >= 3173 && absX <= 3266 && absY >= 3381 && absY <= 3510)The first X is the X coord in the SouthWest corner of the area you want to make non wilderness.
The First Y is the Y coord in the SouthWest corner of the area you want to make non wilderness.
The Second X is the X coord in the NorthEast corner of the area you want to make non wilderness.
The Second Y is the Y coord in the NorthEast corner of the area you want to make non wilderness.
So say the area you wanted to make non wilderness was a house and the southwest corner of it was coordinates X:2000 Y:3000 and the northeast corner of the house was X:2500 Y:3500
You should have something that looks like this:
Code: || (absX >= 2000 && absX <= 2500 && absY >= 3000 && absY <= 3500)Once you have it completed with the correct coords put in, add it to the list of them below Public Boolean Nonwild and save + compile
Congrats! You have just turned somewhere where you can pk into a safe zone!
===========================================HOPE THIS HEPED!=========================================== - Teh war of noobs

item.title: Turning wilderness into a safezone [317 servers]!
item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

[quote=“123kdd100, post:14, topic:326008”]Srry, but theres an easier way I was messing around with my files.
I removed a wilderness code something like attackingon2.wilderness.
There wasnt wilderness any more.
Lol, there was a skull but you couldnt attack.
Wierd huh?[/quote]

you’re kidding right? that doesn’t turn a part of the wilderness to a safezone, just turns wilderness off completely and therefore you won’t be able to attack anybody, and the showInterface statements still exist ahd therefore you will have a skull and you won’t be ale to attack anybody.

Read full topic

item.title: Turning wilderness into a safezone [317 servers]!
item.dc:creator: @Berky-Scape Berky-Scape
item.description:
@Berky-Scape wrote:

[quote=“deathschaos9, post:2, topic:326008”]So, where did you leech this from, because your Code: is showing up almost as if someone had copied

|| (absX >= 3173 && absX <= 3266 && absY >= 3381 && absY <= 3510)The first X is the X coord in the SouthWest corner of the area you want to make non wilderness. so that it looked like

Code: [Select]
|| (absX >= 3173 && absX <= 3266 && absY >= 3381 && absY <= 3510)The first X is the X coord in the SouthWest corner of the area you want to make non wilderness.

See what Im getting at here?

And that Boolean doesn’t exist on most servers.[/quote]

It’s just a normal boolean, but this is just a basic thing. You learn that when you start making server I learned this on my 11th year.

Read full topic
